personal_info.name: Abel Mapharisa
personal_info.headline: Lead Software Developer at Absa Group
personal_info.summary:
Abel is a full-stack developer with more than 10 years commercial experience, working on monolithic as well as event-driven micro-services applications. He is experienced with database design, application design, mentoring junior developers and working with the team to influence good design principles as well as using his past experience to minimize the technical debt. With technology rapidly improving, he heavily relies on udemy for upskilling and personal development. The tech stack that he has worked on, includes (but not limited to) Linux, Docker, RedHat OpenShift, MySQL, PostgreSQL, RedisDB, Flyway by Boxfuse, JUnit, JEE7, Spring Framework, RabbitMQ, AngularJS, Angular4, TypeScript, HTML5, tomcat, WildFly, Glassfish/Payara, jasper reportsI once read a line that went like: "find a job that you love, that way, your work just turns into a hobby". I guess I happened to be that fortunate. Long story short, my job is my joy
...
